name: custom_captcha
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool captcha_v2.
Tool description:  SmileMe's Captcha provide a Captcha image for you. Just call and the API will return the info Captcha ( include image base64, id, value ...) 
API description: captcha code is user format. 

- string is number or character, string length is up to 8 (from 1 to 8)

string.description: The captcha code consisting of numbers or characters, with a maximum length of 8. Defaults to 'smileme'.
